Added classes
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.util.ReadAheadFileOperations
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.util.CoalescingFileOperations

Added interfaces

Updated classes
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.util.MemoryFileOperations:
    Added a constructor taking an initial capacity to class.
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.util.StructuredFileOperations:
    Removed any caching performed in favour of the new generalized caching implementations.
Updated the XML module descriptor to the 1.1 model version.

Classes org.jdtaus.core.io.util.MemoryFileOperations and org.jdtaus.core.io.util.RandomAccessFileOperations>/code> did not update the file pointer value when using one of the methods read(OutputStream) or write(InputStream).
Class org.jdtaus.core.io.util.MemoryFileOperations did not update the file pointer value correctly when truncating a file.

Added classes
  • org.jdtaus.core.text.util.MessageLogger
Updated classes
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.util.CoalescingFileOperations:
    Changed the modifier of method getBlockSize() from private to public. Added method getFileOperations(). Added method close() introduced in the 1.3 API FileOperations interface.
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.util.MemoryFileOperations:
    Added method close() introduced in the 1.3 API FileOperations interface.
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.util.RandomAccessFileOperations:
    Added method close() introduced in the 1.3 API FileOperations interface.
  • org.jdtaus.core.io.util.RandomAccessFileOperations:
    Changed the modifier of method getCacheSize() from private to public. Added method getFileOperations(). Added method close() introduced in the 1.3 API FileOperations interface.
  • org.jdtaus.core.monitor.util.SwingProgressMonitor:
    Changed the modifier of methods getMillisToPopup() and getMillisToDecideToPopup() from private to public.
  • org.jdtaus.core.text.util.SwingMessagePane:
    Added method getMaximumMessages(). Added support for MessageEvents of type ERROR. Added a constructor taking the value of property maximumMessages for programmatic configuration.

Updated class
  • org.jdtaus.core.monitor.util.SwingProgressMonitor
    Added a label to the progress dialog displaying the estimated end of an operation.

Updated class
  • org.jdtaus.core.monitor.util.SwingProgressMonitor
    The dialog sometimes did not get closed correctly.
Updated module descriptor to 1.2 model version.
Updated module descriptor to 1.3 model version.
Corrected IllegalArgumentException thrown by class org.jdtaus.core.monitor.util.TaskDurationLogger due to invalid message template.
Removed deprecations of methods equals and hashCode of class MemoryFileOperations.
Updated module descriptor to 1.4 model version and added additional dependencies to class java.util.Locale.

Updated class org.jdtaus.core.monitor.util.SwingProgressMonitor to correctly display the expected end time of running tasks. Prior to this version the dialog showed a constantly increasing end time instead of what got computed internally.
Updated class org.jdtaus.core.lang.util.ExceptionMessageProducer to correct IllegalArgumentExceptions getting thrown for UNC path names.
Updated any references to the jDTAUS server to point to the SF.net servers.
